 Digg This     Reddit        Stumble Upon     Technorati     Twitter        Facebook     Windows Live     Yahoo                 MySpace     Email                   Bread Crumbs                Home          >           Events Calendar          >           The Future of Intersectional Gender Studies: Where Do We Go from Here?                                                                The Future of Intersectional Gender Studies: Where Do We Go from Here?   Apr 9, 2015                                   | 6:30 PM-8:30 PM       Join us to explore the future of gender studies. What does ethical feminism look like within the academy? Who controls the production of “new gender” knowledge? Panelists include Sheril Antonio , NYU Tisch; Ritty Lukose , NYU Gallatin; and Sara Murphy , NYU Gallatin. The event will be moderated by Gallatin MA Students Claire Horn and Syma Mohammed .     6:30-7 pm (pre-reception)  7-8:30 pm (panel discussion)   With support from the John W. Draper Master's Program and NYU Center for the Study of Gender and Sexuality                           Date + Time      Apr 9, 2015                                   | 6:30 PM-8:30 PM              Location      20 Cooper Square, 7th Floor                           Open to Public?           yes                              RSVP      RSVP                                               top of page                               RSVP                                                                                    NYU Gallatin Footer              Gallatin School of Individualized Study     1 Washington Place     New York, NY 10003     (212) 998-7370                   A–Z Index      Directions      Contact Us      Job Opportunities               News      Support Gallatin      Feedback                         Follow us on Facebook      Follow us on Twitter      Follow us on Youtube         Follow us Instagram                 Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright NYU Gallatin.
